Text: This is a CBR right?  Someone keeps uploading PDFs here... YUCK!

unnim2, you're welcome.

Sovikos, if i don't put the file type in the description, you can always click on the number to the right of the word "Files:" near the top of the page. then you can see the file type before downloading.
Thanks STF.  By the way Sovikos, if you use ComicRack as the reader program it has the facility to convert pdf to cbr in any case.
you're welcome jennysparks. and thanks for that info, i didn't know that.
